title: Liv Green at River Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located just off Piesang Valley Road in Plettenberg Bay and nestled under indigenous trees. Serves wraps, smoothies, fresh juices, organic specials with vegan choices. Located behind the Gym and Waterworld. Also caters for cancer patients with dietary needs. Licensed Bar with daily specials.
